FuncDef: The reset arp fast-reply statistics command resets statistics on ARP fast reply packets on the board in a specified slot. The reset arp fast-reply statistics command resets statistics on ARP fast reply packets on the board in a specified slot.

ParaDef.Info:
Clears statistics on ARP fast reply packets in a specified slot. The slot ID range varies according to the device hardware.
The value is a string of 1 to 23 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.
